import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../FormEstilos/formAddVinos.css"; import { agregarVinosApi } from "../../../Api/vinos"; export default function FormAddVinos() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ codigo: "", nombre: "", marca: "", nacionalidad: "", precioUnitario: "", precioBotella: "", yearCosecha: "", restaurante: "", cantidad: "", descripcion: "", foto: "NA" }); const changeForm = e => { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const result = agregarVinosApi(inputs); } return (
